lead_paragraph: Briny Baird shot a three-under-par 69 to take a one-stroke lead over Peter Lonard and Jay Williamson in the Zurich Classic in Avondale, La. Baird, winless on the PGA Tour, birdied the final two holes to finish at eight under at the T.P.C. Louisiana. Lonard shot a 70, and Williamson had a 69. The defending champion Nick Watney (67) was two strokes back.
